author: m0_ox
content: I just published a new patch @ [bal v1.4.1](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v1.4.1). I did some manual checking here on some of the reported cases from the last release and this looked stable enough for me to put it out there as the new baseline. As always, if you see any anomalies please reach out and hopefully we can iterate more quickly on specifics. I'm quite happy to iterate on new patches if we need them!

author: raxhvl
content:
#  **v1.4.1 Test Suite**

ℹ️  With this patch **v1.4.1** release, you should be able to test:

## 1. Tests for Storage Read-Write Precedence h/t <@427903869226582018> 
- **test_bal_storage_write_read_same_frame**: Write precedence same frame
- **test_bal_storage_write_read_cross_frame**: Write precedence across frames

## 2. Tests for the Coinbase
- **test_bal_empty_block_no_coinbase**: Empty block and coinbase
- **test_bal_coinbase_zero_tip**: Zero tip to coinbase

## 3. Tests for Withdrawal

### 3.1 Basic Withdrawal Tests
- **test_bal_withdrawal_empty_block**: Withdrawal in empty block
- **test_bal_withdrawal_and_transaction**: Withdrawal with separate tx
- **test_bal_withdrawal_to_nonexistent_account**: Withdrawal creating new account

### 3.2 Withdrawal Behavior Tests
- **test_bal_withdrawal_no_evm_execution**: Confirms no code execution
- **test_bal_withdrawal_and_state_access_same_account**: Contract accessed + withdrawal
- **test_bal_withdrawal_and_value_transfer_same_address**: Value transfer + withdrawal to same address

### 3.3 Edge Cases
- **test_bal_multiple_withdrawals_same_address**: Multiple withdrawals accumulate
- **test_bal_withdrawal_and_selfdestruct**: Withdrawal to self-destructed address
- **test_bal_withdrawal_and_new_contract**: Withdrawal to just-created contract
- **test_bal_zero_withdrawal**: Zero-amount withdrawal
- **test_bal_withdrawal_to_precompiles**: Withdrawal to all precompiles
- **test_bal_withdrawal_large_amount**: Maximum u64 value
- **test_bal_withdrawal_to_coinbase**: Withdrawal to coinbase with tx
- **test_bal_withdrawal_to_coinbase_empty_block**: Withdrawal to coinbase in empty block

## 4. Tests for Transactions to Non Existent Accounts
- **test_bal_nonexistent_zero_value_transfer**: Zero value transfer
- **test_bal_nonexistent_account_access**: Reading non-existent accounts

## 5. Tests for Precompiles
- **test_bal_precompile_funded**: Precompile value transfer
- **test_bal_precompile_call**: Precompile contract calls
